unnormalised: Hey folks! Solar rooftop subsidies are awesome, right? Remember Ramesh from Chennai installing his? He said it slashed his electricity bill by like, Rs. 2000/month! Makes me wanna install one before Diwali. Heard MNRE is extending the scheme. Anyone else had good experiences? Is it worth the initial investment, especially considering the panel degradation after, say, 10 years in the Delhi heat? Thinking of powering my whole house, even the AC. More info needed!
normalised: Hey folks! Solar rooftop subsidies are awesome, right? Remember Ramesh from Chennai installing his? He said it slashed his electricity bill by like, rupee two thousand per month! Makes me wanna install one before Diwali. Heard M N R E is extending the scheme. Anyone else had good experiences? Is it worth the initial investment, especially considering the panel degradation after, say, ten years in the Delhi heat? Thinking of powering my whole house, even the A C. More info needed!
